SEARCH
Package codigo.ProyectoAlgoritmos

Class LeerFile

java.lang.Object
codigo.ProyectoAlgoritmos.LeerFile
public class LeerFile extends Object
This class contains methods to read Java methods from a file, analyze their complexity, and manage them within a circular linked list.

      public LeerFile()

  • Method Details

    • readMethods

      public static void readMethods(String rutaArchivo, CircularList listaProcedimientos)
      Reads methods from a specified file and adds them to a circular list.
      Parameters:
      rutaArchivo - The path to the file containing Java methods.
      listaProcedimientos - The circular list to store the methods.

    • excludeSum

      public static int excludeSum(String cadena, String subcadena)
      Excludes sums within quoted strings and counts occurrences of a substring.
      Parameters:
      cadena - The string to search within.
      subcadena - The substring to count.
      Returns:
      The count of non-quoted occurrences of the substring.

    • countStatement

      public static int countStatement(String linea)
      Counts variable declarations in a line of code.
      Parameters:
      linea - The line of code to analyze.
      Returns:
      The count of variable declarations.

    • extractNameMethod

      public static String extractNameMethod(String linea)
      Extracts the name of a method from a line of code.
      Parameters:
      linea - The line of code to analyze.
      Returns:
      The name of the method, or null if no method is found.

    • calculateComplexityN

      public static int calculateComplexityN(int contadorDeclaraciones, int contadorSumas, int contadorRestas)
      Calculates the total complexity (N) based on declarations, sums, and subtractions.
      Parameters:
      contadorDeclaraciones - The count of variable declarations.
      contadorSumas - The count of sum operations.
      contadorRestas - The count of subtraction operations.
      Returns:
      The total complexity (N).

    • calculateComplexityM

      public static int calculateComplexityM(String nombreMetodo, String metodo)
      Calculates the complexity (M) of a method based on loops.
      Parameters:
      nombreMetodo - The name of the method.
      metodo - The content of the method.
      Returns:
      The complexity (M) of the method.

    • countLoops

      public static int countLoops(String metodo)
      Counts the number of loop statements (for, while, do-while) in a method.
      Parameters:
      metodo - The method content to analyze.
      Returns:
      The count of loop statements.

    • countSubstring

      public static int countSubstring(String cadena, String subcadena)
      Counts the occurrences of a substring within a string.
      Parameters:
      cadena - The string to search within.
      subcadena - The substring to count.
      Returns:
      The count of occurrences of the substring.

    • nestedLoop

      public static boolean nestedLoop(String metodo)
      Checks for nested loops within a method.
      Parameters:
      metodo - The method content to analyze.
      Returns:
      True if nested loops are found, false otherwise.

    • countKeys

      public static int countKeys(String linea)
      Counts the number of opening and closing braces in a line of code.
      Parameters:
      linea - The line of code to analyze.
      Returns:
      The net count of braces (positive for more opening braces, negative for more closing braces).

    • calculateComplexityBigO

      public static String calculateComplexityBigO(int cantidadBucles)
      Determines the Big-O complexity based on the number of loops.
      Parameters:
      cantidadBucles - The count of loops in a method.
      Returns:
      The Big-O complexity as a string.

    • showMenu

      public static void showMenu(CircularList listaProcedimientos)
      Displays a menu for the user to interact with the circular list of methods.
      Parameters:
      listaProcedimientos - The circular list containing the methods.
